texts.textentryhtml: A British family trust (until 1956; sale, Christie’s London, February 17, 1956, lot 72); Arcade Gallery, London (in 1956); Benedict Nicolson, London (1956–1978); Alex Wengraf, Limited (in 1983; sold to Princeton University Art Museum).
